description: Meant to accompany a series of tables that Walter von Nessen created around 1930, this lamp illustrates America’s shift to a streamlined modern aesthetic during the 1930s. Von Nessen championed the use of metal as an appropriate material to capture the look and spirit of the modern age.
artist_info:
Designed by Walter von Nessen (American
born Germany, 1889–1943)
Manufactured by Nessen Studio, Inc. (American, founded 1927)
New York
title: Table Lamp
